text: Cattārimāni bhikkhave upādānāni kāmupādānaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ attavādupādānaṃ
edit: Cattārimāni bhikkhave upādānāni – kāmupādānaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ attavādupādānaṃ

translations.transtext: Monks, [they are] four clingings: clinging to sensual pleasure, clinging to views, clinging to ritualistic observance, [and] clinging to the self.
